name: unwrap
label: Unwrap
description: Unwrap phase by changing absolute gap greater than discontinuity

name: unwrap
label: Unwrap
description: Unwrap phase by changing absolute gap greater than discontinuity

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Angle unit of the provided TS (default value is radian)
parameters.label: Unit

parameters.name: discontinuity
parameters.description: Maximum discontinuity between values expressed with the same unit as "Angle unit". Example in radian: "pi", in degrees: "180"
parameters.label: Discontinuity

parameters.name: fid_pattern
parameters.description: Python pattern determining format of output functional identifiers. Example : %(fid)s__unwrap where '%(fid)s' is the Functional Identifier of the original time series.
parameters.label: FuncId pattern

outputs.name: ts_list
outputs.label: TS list
outputs.description: List of unwrapped TS (same order as input)
